titles.title: To provide eligibility for military commissary and exchange privileges and space-available transportation on military aircraft to certain former enlisted members of the Armed Forces discharged for disability.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Readiness.

bill.summary: 7/28/1993--Introduced. Requires the Secretary of Defense to provide that veterans discharged from active military service before October 1, 1949, for a service-connected disease or disability rated as 30 percent or more disabling and who retained the disability for five years are eligible for military commissary and exchange privileges and space-available transportation on military aircraft to the same extent as retired members of the armed forces.
